newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nike strong buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nike strong buy repeated.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said analyst Brett Barakett reiterated a strong buy rating on Nike Inc.
-- cited recent stock price weakness. Shares were off 1/8 to 66-3/4, and have slipped since reaching an all-time closing high of 75-3/4 on February 13.
-- said expected earnings of $0.70 per share for the third quarter ended in February. The company was expected to report results on March 20.
-- Gruntal said it raised its rating to outperform from outperform-long term. Analyst Michael Conn also cited weakness in the stock price.
-- Conn estimated earnings of $0.72 for the quarter.
-- shares of Nike slipped earlier Tuesday after a footwear trade magazine reported that Nike may have lost some significant orders for the critical back-to-school season, market sources said.
-- analysts dismissed the reports as unsubstantiated and untrue. The company would not comment, explaining it was in the quiet period in advance of the earnings report.
